articles.author: Roxana Hadadi
articles.title: Review: 'Barry' Eschews Humor in Dark Season 4 - Vulture
articles.description: In its concluding act, Bill Hader’s HBO series about the titular assassin turned actor reaches subterranean levels of bleakness, and a couple of unexpected line deliveries and zany set pieces can’t right that imbalance.
articles.content: We use all kinds of adjectives to adapt our expectations of genre, to give wiggle room to creators who want to push established narrative structures into unusual places. Elevated horror, cerebral sci… [+4658 chars]
